ext_weather.name: Tonight
ext_weather.shortForecast: Slight Chance Showers And Thunderstorms then Chance Showers And Thunderstorms
ext_weather.detailedForecast: A slight chance of showers and thunderstorms before 10pm, then a chance of showers and thunderstorms between 10pm and 1am, then a chance of showers and thunderstorms. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 72. South wind 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precipitation is 40%. New rainfall amounts between a quarter and half of an inch possible.
